COMPANY.INTRODUCTION.DETAIL.A: Yidao New Energy (Quzhou) Co., Ltd. is a comprehensive service provider engaged in the research, development, manufacturing, and construction of high-efficiency photovoltaic cells, module packaging technology, system applications, and dedicated to comprehensive solutions for new energy applications.
COMPANY.INTRODUCTION.DETAIL.B: The company is headquartered in Quzhou Intelligent Manufacturing New City, with large-scale photovoltaic production bases in Quzhou, Zhejiang, Taizhou, Suzhou, and Shuozhou, Shanxi.
